data.name: Looking for Imago Demo
data.short_description: Looking for Imago is a peaceful but yet challenging puzzle-platformer in which you will be lead to tame insects & natural elements to progress in your quest. Get ready to discover a new way to interact with the critters of this world!

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
